codeSystems.name: PpqmActorIdentifierType
codeSystems.title: PPQm Actor Identifier Type
codeSystems.description: Actor Identifier Types for PPQm

codeSystems.name: PpqmConsentIdentifierType
codeSystems.title: PPQm Consent Identifier Type
codeSystems.description: Value Set for PPQm Consent Identifier Types

codeSystems.name: PpqmFeedRequestHttpMethod
codeSystems.title: PPQm Feed Request HTTP Method
codeSystems.description: HTTP methods allowed in PPQm Feed requests

codeSystems.name: PpqmPolicySetTemplateId
codeSystems.title: PPQm Policy Set Template ID
codeSystems.description: IDs of policy set templates

codeSystems.name: PpqmReferencedPolicySet
codeSystems.title: PPQm Referenced Policy Set
codeSystems.description: IDs of basis policy sets that may be referenced from templates.  Note that this value set intentionally does not contain IDs of all policy sets contained in the official stack, see [documentation](https://github.com/ehealthsuisse/ch-epr-adr-ppq/blob/main/docs/Policies.md)

codeSystems.name: EprPurposeOfUse
codeSystems.title: EprPurposeOfUse
codeSystems.description: Purpose Of Use as per Annex 5 EPRO-FDHA, Extension 1.

codeSystems.name: EprRole
codeSystems.title: EprRole
codeSystems.description: Role codes as per Annex 5 EPRO-FDHA, version July 2019

codeSystems.name: BundleType
codeSystems.title: BundleType
codeSystems.description: Indicates the purpose of a bundle - how it is intended to be used.

codeSystems.name: ConsentActionCodes
codeSystems.title: Consent Action Codes
codeSystems.description: This value set includes sample Consent Action codes.

codeSystems.name: ConsentCategoryCodes
codeSystems.title: Consent Category Codes
codeSystems.description: This value set includes sample Consent Directive Type codes, including several consent directive related LOINC codes; HL7 VALUE SET: ActConsentType(2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19897); examples of US realm consent directive legal descriptions and references to online and/or downloadable forms such as the SSA-827 Authorization to Disclose Information to the Social Security Administration; and other anticipated consent directives related to participation in a clinical trial, medical procedures, reproductive procedures; health care directive (Living Will); advance directive, do not resuscitate (DNR); Physician Orders for Life-Sustaining Treatment (POLST)

codeSystems.name: ConsentContentClass
codeSystems.title: Consent Content Class
codeSystems.description: This value set includes the FHIR resource types, along with some other important content class codes

codeSystems.name: ConsentContentCodes
codeSystems.title: Consent Content Codes
codeSystems.description: This example value set contains all LOINC code

codeSystems.name: ConsentDataMeaning
codeSystems.title: ConsentDataMeaning
codeSystems.description: How a resource reference is interpreted when testing consent restrictions.

codeSystems.name: ConsentPolicyRuleCodes
codeSystems.title: Consent PolicyRule Codes
codeSystems.description: This value set includes sample Regulatory consent policy types from the US and other regions.

codeSystems.name: ConsentProvisionType
codeSystems.title: ConsentProvisionType
codeSystems.description: How a rule statement is applied, such as adding additional consent or removing consent.

codeSystems.name: ConsentScopeCodes
codeSystems.title: Consent Scope Codes
codeSystems.description: This value set includes the four Consent scope codes.

codeSystems.name: ConsentState
codeSystems.title: ConsentState
codeSystems.description: Indicates the state of the consent.

codeSystems.name: HTTPVerb
codeSystems.title: HTTPVerb
codeSystems.description: HTTP verbs (in the HTTP command line). See [HTTP rfc](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231) for details.

codeSystems.name: Identifier Type Codes
codeSystems.title: IdentifierType
codeSystems.description: A coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.

codeSystems.name: IdentifierUse
codeSystems.title: IdentifierUse
codeSystems.description: Identifies the purpose for this identifier, if known .

codeSystems.name: CommonLanguages
codeSystems.title: Common Languages
codeSystems.description: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

codeSystems.name: ResourceType
codeSystems.title: Resource Types
codeSystems.description: Concrete FHIR Resource Types

codeSystems.name: SearchEntryMode
codeSystems.title: SearchEntryMode
codeSystems.description: Why an entry is in the result set - whether it's included as a match or because of an _include requirement, or to convey information or warning information about the search process.

codeSystems.name: All Security Labels
codeSystems.title: SecurityLabels
codeSystems.description: A single value set for all security labels defined by FHIR.
